text: Time, Forward! () is a 1965 Soviet drama movie directed by Sofiya Milkina and Mikhail Schweitzer.В Москве покажут ретроспективу режиссера Михаила ШвейцераВРЕМЯ, ВПЕРЕД It stars Sergei Yursky, Inna Gulaya, and Tamara Syomina. ==Actors== * Sergei Yursky as David Margulies * Inna Gulaya as Shura Soldatova * Tamara Syomina as Olya Trigubova * Leonid Kuravlyov as Korneyev * Vladimir Kashpur as Kanunnikov * Stanislav Khitrov as Sayenko == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1965 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Schweitzer
title: Time, Forward!
